visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series named 'Temperature 2022' and 'Temperature 2023', with corresponding data points for each month. The chart should also have custom colors for the series and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes two data series: 'Temperature 2022' and 'Temperature 2023', each with corresponding temperature data for each month. The x-axis displays the months as categories, and the y-axis is labeled with 'Temperature (°C)'. Both axes have styled labels with specific colors and font sizes. The chart title and axis titles are also styled with appropriate colors and font sizes. The legend is styled to have bold black text. The chart has a light gray background and custom margins to ensure readability. The series data points are colored with custom colors '#FF6347' and '#4682B4' for 'Temperature 2022' and 'Temperature 2023', respectively.
